page.title: 13CHURCH SERVICES
page.content: {BAPTISM AT BROOKSIDE FREE CHURCH} At our church every so often we have a baptism service. Last Sunday we had one and nine people got baptised.Among them was one of my "7UP CLUB" leaders whose name is Trisha. Before they get baptised they give a testimony and afterwards they choose a song and the congregation sing it as they come out of the baptistry. Trisha chose the song "As the deer pants for the water so my soul longs for you". People get baptised because they want to show they've given their life to{JESUS. {PENTECOST AT ST.PETER'S} My favourite service was at Pentecost when we acted as if our Pathfinder leader was Jesus and we were his disciples. We were very sad because Jesus had been killed and Jesus found us, He gave us a bit of Easter Egg as food.
